name: Iced Americano
Instruction: Brew a double shot of espresso.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the espresso over the ice.
Add cold water to taste.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Latte
Instruction: Brew a single shot of espresso.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the espresso over the ice.
Add cold milk and stir.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Mocha
Instruction: Brew a single shot of espresso.
Mix the chocolate syrup with the espresso.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the chocolate-espresso mix over the ice.
Add cold milk and stir.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Caramal Macchiato
Instruction: Blend the coffee, ice, milk, and chocolate syrup until smooth.
Pour into a glass.
Top with whipped cream if desired.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Mocha Maddness
Instruction: Blend the coffee, ice, milk, and chocolate syrup until smooth.
Pour into a glass.
Top with whipped cream if desired.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Cappuccino
Instruction: Brew a single shot of espresso.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the espresso over the ice.
Add cold milk.
Top with milk foam.
Serve immediately.
